name: Deliver (WorldMan)
description:
Deliver is an Idle arcade game aimed at players of all ages.

Get distracted while commuting to work in the subway or taxi, spend a few minutes in a calm atmosphere and relax after work, your task is to collect parcels and deliver them to the post office.

NOTIFICATION:

  • This game is for Android. Minimum Android 5.0.
  • Please let me know if the game is not working properly for you.

PLAYABLE ITEMS:

On the territory of the city, you can find boxes with a multiplier of X2 for 30 seconds, also picking up such a box again will extend the timer

CONTROL:

Tap the screen to display the joystick

FOLOWING

Thanks so much for playing this Deliver!

INFORMATION:

  • Version 1.0 (CPI test)
